description.translate: Alone he goes, but the respect of all: masters, warriors and kings, he has.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Paladin\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Seul il va, mais le respect de tous :\"}","{\"text\":\"§7maîtres, guerriers et rois, il a.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Alone he goes, but the respect of all:\"}","{\"text\":\"§7masters, warriors and kings, he has.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7HER§c-2\"}"]}}
